Traits.Name: Parry
Traits.Description: 1/round when targeted by an attack, may gain evasion against the attack as an interrupt.

Actions.Name: Reparte
Actions.Effect: May dash 1 before and after the attack.

Actions.Name: Fencer's Wit
Actions.Description: Mark a character in range 3. Gain evasion against the marked character, and when the marked character takes an action, may dash 1 as an effect.
